channel.title: How do I get a free domain name?
channel.description: Anyone know how? I only know how to get a free .eu domain name for non-profit purpose.

item.title: How do I get a free domain name?
item.dc:creator: @spankjava spank
item.description:
@spankjava wrote:

I got one from justhost.com for a year but i think they stopped it.

item.source: How do I get a free domain name?

item.title: How do I get a free domain name?
item.dc:creator: @Cheese_Police c|p
item.description:
@Cheese_Police wrote:

http://namecheap.com/ offers .info domains at $2.98 for the first year, standard pricing for every year after that. It includes WhoisGuard for 1 year on that domain as well, if you care about that sort of thing.

I use namecheap, their service is great.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I get a free domain name?

item.title: How do I get a free domain name?
item.dc:creator: @inertia inertia
item.description:
@inertia wrote:

[quote=“West7man, post:6, topic:317184”]What about .tk? Or other such kind of domain names?
.tk sounds stupid to me… I don’t know why. Maybe because most of .tk sites that I’ve seen are ugly or contain ugly stuff…[/quote]

.tk would be a great tld but as you say, only morons register .tk domains and always have shitty sites. It also makes me think of tk maxx, which is never good…

Read full topic

item.title: How do I get a free domain name?
item.dc:creator: @blah_bah7 blah bah7
item.description:
@blah_bah7 wrote:

Domains aren’t really expensive… just like nine dollars a year for a .com at 1and1.com. Are you talking about a domain or hosting? The most basic hosting at 1and1.com is only 4 dollars a month.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I get a free domain name?

item.title: How do I get a free domain name?
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

Back when I first started messing with websites I would use http://www.domainlagoon.com/ it’s legit and very easy. You just fill out surveys, and earn points. When you earn enough points you can purchase a domain with the points.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I get a free domain name?

Neither are that great as Moparisthebest mentioned, but it’s something.
